WaiWai CEO to Speak About AI in Sales at Germes Business Club

Apr 7, 2025

On April 17, with support from the Moscow Chamber of Commerce and Industry, a meeting of the Germes business club will take place. Event topic: "Digital Transformation of Russian Business: Key Challenges, Successes, and Prospects."

WaiWai CEO Mik Weisman will present a talk titled "From Cold Calls to Hot Dialogues: Why Personalized AI Outreach is the New Oil in B2B."

Venue: Moscow, 15/1 Petrovka Street, Grand Hall of the MCCI (entrance from Stoleshnikov Lane).

The Germes business club brings together business owners and CEOs. The club was created by the Association of Procurement Participants (forumauz.ru).
